long_description: Discover the secret of Central Washington's quality granite boulders in this bouldering guidebook covering the Leavenworth and Gold Bar areas. Author: Kelly Sheridan. Softcover; black-and-white photos; maps; diagrams. Sharp End Publishing; copyright 2007. The secret's out, the rumors are true, and it's open season on the Northwest's impressive cache of fantastic problems. From the endless folds of Leavenworth's forested canyons to the hilltop Shangri-la of Gold Bar, Washington offers something for everyone. Specific beta, detailed maps and dozens of rich images will get you stoked.
short_description: Discover the secret of Central Washington's quality granite boulders in this bouldering guidebook covering the Leavenworth and Gold Bar areas.
